subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored a season-high 33 points Friday, winning a matchup of Western Conference All-Star power forwards in Minneapolis and helping the Mavericks stave off a Minnesota rally.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored a season-high 33 points Friday, winning a matchup of Western Conference All-Star power forwards in Minneapolis and helping the Mavericks stave off a Minnesota rally.
